casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Johnny Wayne HYDE. No. 529A98-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Edwin L. West, III, Wilmington, Richard McNeill, for Johnny Wayne Hyde. Edwin W. Welch, Special Deputy Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

AMENDED ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th day of September 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Onslow County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County: "Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005." Justice WAINWRIGHT recused.
